Content.Text:
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey, you're new! Are you the farmer who
just moved to this town, by any chance? 
<PAGE>
Ah, sorry! Forgive my rudeness. I haven't
introduced myself yet, have I? It's nice to meet
you. I'm <BLUE>Mistel</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
I'll see you around, okay?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How can I help
you?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. You're sure looking bright-eyed
for this early hour!
<PAGE>
I'm not a morning person at all, so I should take
lessons.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, did you get enough sleep? You
have some pretty thick bags under your eyes.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How are you?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I'm sorry, I was lost in thought. How can I
help you today?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Have you settled into this
town yet? You feel at home here?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's night time already?! My... Whenever it gets
dark, I always have to wonder where the day
went. You know what I mean?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening to you! Are you done with all the
day's work yet? I think you deserve a good rest!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The night is still young, but if you don't go
home and get some sleep, you might not be.
Exhaustion will age you before your time!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning to you. You're certainly a sight for
tired eyes! Good way to start the day, seeing
you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Not even noon yet, and you've already come for
a visit? Guess you really wanted to see me!
<PAGE>
Hee hee. You're adorable! "Did I want to see you
too," you ask... Of course I did! That's like asking
if grass grows on the hill!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning. Looking good! Let's both make
the most of this beautiful day.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. How's your morning been? Busy? Be sure
you don't push yourself too hard, now!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee. I'd know those footsteps anywhere!
Hello, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I was just thinking about
you, and here you are! Perhaps you wish to
ensure I never stop thinking about you...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Have you been busy
this whole day? I can certainly relate. I think we
all can! We've been there, to be sure.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. You seem a bit tired. Perhaps you
could stand to turn in early tonight!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening. It's a beautiful night, isn't it?
...Why do I say that? Well, because you've come
to see me, of course!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. Do you feel refreshed after a
lovely night's sleep? If you're still tired, you
should probably take it easy today.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You were calling
my name in your sleep. Makes a man wonder
what sort of dream you were having!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. Let's give it our all today, shall
we? Just as long as our all isn't too much for
you to bear, anyway!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You seemed rather busy this morning, so I
refrained from bothering you. Are things a bit
calmer now?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You still seem pretty out of it. Shall I wake thee
with a kiss? ...Hee hee, just kidding!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, I've been feeling so lonely... You
didn't even give me so much as a "hello" this
morning!
<PAGE>
You'll stay with me now to make up for
shunning your husband right? Hee hee...and
you'd better be ready to atone!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I know you've been busy, but I'm your husband.
We share a house! You really should take a
moment to talk to me every now and again.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You must be tired. If you can pack up your
work, however, would we be able to talk for a
bit?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're quite the hard worker. Don't stay up too
late, though! I don't want to sleep alone...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nice and sunny out, huh? Good book weather.
Spread yourself out under a tree and get lost in
some other world, you know?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not that I hate rainy days, but I can't say I like
them, either...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
*sigh* Why must summer exist? It's so
infuriatingly hot...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rainwater washes away the heat bit by bit. I
hope this keeps up, as we could definitely stand
to cool off.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is more like it, huh? I love the weather this
time of year. Helps me keep focused on my
work.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rainy days like this always change my plans.
Even if I were going to go out before, I'm
certainly not now!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It feels like winter is certainly not holding back
on us. Brrrr...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I thought I felt a chill in the air when I woke up,
so it wasn't a surprise when I saw it was
snowing. Guess the time to bundle up is nigh!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What makes you want to go out in weather like
this? Are you just feeling reckless, or what?!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Every time I think about all the snow I'm going
to have to shovel once this is over, I get a
splitting headache. *sigh* This will not be fun...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know there's a typhoon on, right? Doesn't
that seem like a good reason to stay in? I mean,
far be it from me to hold you back, but still...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You realize we're in the midst of a blizzard,
right? Can't believe you'd go out in this. I mean,
far be it from me to hold you back, but still...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>, I hear you're seeing someone!
I'm not sure if "congratulations" are in order,
exactly, but...well, good for you!
<PAGE>
It's already the talk of the town. Which is to be
expected, I guess, in a small town like this.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Klaus has a tremendous talent for perfume-
making. You should ask him to make some for
you, if you're at all inclined. You won't regret it!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Ah, perfect timing. Can you talk to Agate for
me? She's fallen so many times just today
alone...I'm really worried about her.
<PAGE>
She keeps telling me she's fine, but when I see
someone constantly losing their balance and
face-planting, I can't help but feel concerned!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've got some valuable and rather fragile things
here, so please, do me a favor... Don't run.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You see the beautiful butterfly over there?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you heard about the spring?
<PAGE>
People say there's a spring that grants wishes.
Anyone's wishes.
<PAGE>
People say a lot of things, though! So I don't put
much stock in old folk stories like that, myself.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nothing like fresh water from the mountain. It's
crystal clear! You don't get water like this near
the city, that's for sure.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There sure are a lot of bugs around here. I
wonder how many? It has to be a finite amount,
but it also has to be a huge number, you know?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's wonderful that this town has such a great
environment for farming. I'm happy for the
farmers here, truly.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Giorgio's farm is awfully sophisticated. It's fun to
observe what he grows!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm walking around here, I can hear the
sound of a water wheel.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm walking around here, I can hear the
sound of a water wheel.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear Elise is renting some land around here.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you doing here? You're not lost, are
you? You looking for something, maybe?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wasn't originally born and raised in this town,
but I do love it here. How about you?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you have any interest in antiques?
<PAGE>
If so, you should come visit my store. I'm quite
certain you'll find something that catches your
fancy there.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do I do in my free time? Well, let me see...
<PAGE>
I like puzzles, and games that challenge my
spatial acumen, like darts and pool.
<PAGE>
Why do you ask? Are you challenging me to
something? Because I'm game to play anything
with you, anytime!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Most of what we have in stock was originally
merchandise my sister and I collected for
ourselves.
<PAGE>
You can't very well sell something to customers
if you don't like it yourself, right?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...You can't imagine what my parents were like?
Well, I've heard stories, but I suppose it doesn't
do me much good to imagine them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But that's totally okay! For me, my only family is
and has always been my sister.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't like people interfering in my affairs any
more than necessary. Though if it's someone I
regard as a close friend, I generally don't mind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Which, of course, means I regard you as a close
friend! Otherwise, I wouldn't be opening up to
you like this.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What was I doing before I came to this town?
Well...
<PAGE>
Well, I moved around a lot with my sister. And
we still haven't decided for certain if we're going
to settle down here yet.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Haha. What a look you're giving me! I'm only
kidding.
<PAGE>
Don't worry, we're not planning to leave this
town anytime in the foreseeable future.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're a pretty unusual person, you know that?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>I don't usually get this friendly with anyone but
my sister, but there's just something about you
that makes me open up!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I never imagined that dating you could be so
painful...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It seems you and I have completely different
opinions about dating.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If you want this relationship to last, we're going
to need to discuss what we both expect from
one another. What we both need...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I started dating you, I thought I didn't have
to worry about you anymore...or anything else,
for that matter.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But I just got greedier and greedier, to the point
that I'm never satisfied at all anymore! And that's
not a good thing, is it?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're so popular around here, I can never really
feel at ease around you, even though we're
dating.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>...But the biggest problem is that you're totally
oblivious to that. Guess I just have to grin and
bear it, huh?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ever since I started dating you, I've had more of
an opportunity to stand beside you and watch
you be the amazing person you are.
<PAGE>
I think my attitude toward other people is
gradually changing, thanks to you. And it feels
like it's a good change.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...The reason I like you? Well, it would have to
be your delicious reactions when I tease you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hee hee. Just kidding! The real reason is...a
secret! Mostly because if I said it out loud, I'd be
so, SO embarrassed...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I don't typically believe in fate, but I feel like it's
more than coincidence to have met you, and
fallen in love to boot...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><FACE_LOVE>It has to be, because I've never loved anyone this
much in my entire life!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Yes? Did you need something? I have nothing
to talk about with you, so if you have no
business with me, I'd suggest you leave.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Sometimes, I feel as though I don't contribute
to the happiness of this household in any
meaningful way...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I feel like your attitude toward me has changed
of late. Is it...just me?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since we have such different personalities and
jobs, I was worried that our married life might
suffer...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...but living with you every day has been more
fun than I ever could've hoped for!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since we both have day jobs, I hope you'll let
me do some of the housework too. When you're
tired, you can always depend on me.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It wasn't until we married that I could really
come to think of you as my...other half. My
better half.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And I definitely needed a better half from the
start, since my half is nothing special! Yet you
still fell for a guy like me, huh?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm so happy to be married to you. Are you
happy too? If you have any complaints -- any at
all! -- please don't hesitate to tell me.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><FACE_LOVE>Living with you from now on will be my greatest
joy, and I'll spare no effort in improving myself
wherever it's needed. I love you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee. <MYNAME>, you're blushing!
<PAGE>
We may be involved now, but things really
haven't changed where it counts. We can get
used to this, bit by bit.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No need for the puppy-dog eyes. I've given this
whole matter a lot of thought, and my mind is
made up.
<PAGE>
I hope you can get along with me as a friend
from now on.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm so glad to be your boyfriend again. Let's try
to make this relationship last longer than before!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm really looking forward to the day when I can
be your husband. I'm sure you'll look absolutely
stunning in a wedding dress!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ever since I first fell in love with you, I've been
dreaming of this moment.
<PAGE>
I'm happier than I've ever been. My dream has
finally come true. I just hope you're ready to be
held tight, because I'm never letting you go!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll learn everything there is to learn about raising
a child, because I intend to do everything in my
power to help lighten your load.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Are you okay to be up and about? I can't bear
the thought of anything happening to you or our
child...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Won't be much longer now, will it? Don't worry,
I'll be right by your side. Let's bring new life into
this world, together!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I've never thought I'd see the day when I'd
become a father. It's such a strange feeling...
Words can't express how happy I feel right now!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that our babies have learned to crawl, we
need to keep a tighter watch over them, to
ensure they don't get themselves in any trouble.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I didn't know children grew so fast... At this
rate, they'll be adults before we know it, won't
they?
<PAGE>
I know, there's still plenty of time till then...but it
saddens me to think that these sweet, innocent
children will leave the nest one day.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that some delicious <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>
I see? Don't tell me you went out of your way to
prepare my favorite food of all time.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R><FACE_LAUGH>Thank you so much! That's really sweet.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're giving me this because you know how
much I like it? Wow, thank you very much!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's one of my favorites! Thank you very
much.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this a present for me? You know it's...not my
birthday, right? Either way, thank you for the
kind thought!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm? What's this for? I guess if you're just
giving it to me out of the goodness of your
heart, I can't very well say no...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't understand why you're trying to give this
to me. I'm not going to need a surplus of these
for any reason...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>This smell... This color... It's that of the foul
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>, isn't it? ...I feel sick...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You went to a lot of trouble to get this for me,
so I'll take it. But please, don't ever give me one
of these again, okay?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, now, here's something I definitely like. And
it's got a brilliant, golden sheen to it, no less!
Thank you so much for such a rare treat.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's like it's made of solid gold. Can
I...really have this? Thank you so much!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Gold is pretty and all, but a golden sheen does
not a perfect gift make. Still...this couldn't have
been easy to get, so thank you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ugh, what is this awful thing? Presenting it to
me in gold makes no difference... I still don't like
it.
<PAGE>
H-hey, don't shove it in my pocket! Geez... I
guess I'll take it, but just this once. Never again,
okay?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)
Let's not give him anything for the moment...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not so forgiving as to accept a gift from
someone who hasn't said a single word to me in
ages.
<PAGE>
Please take it back. I don't need it.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Put that away. This isn't the time. I mean, don't
you have something to say to me before handing
over gifts?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...I don't want a present, I want you. I want to
talk to you, like we used to. I want to hear your
voice. Give me your words, not your paltry gifts.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think I've had enough for one day. Too much of
a good thing, and all that.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Haven't I already received a gift from you today?
Are you trying to butter me up for some reason?
...Did you do something you shouldn't have?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hee hee, I'm just messing with you! But I really
would feel bad receiving another present so
soon. You should hang on to that.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've already received a gift from you today. If you
really, really want to give me something I'll like,
how about...hmmmm...
<PAGE>
...Hey, I didn't say anything yet! Why did you
blush and shake your head? What did you think I
was going to say?!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Is this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> a present for
my birthday? You know me all too well, it
seems!
<PAGE>
Thank you very much. That's very kind of you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
How did you know?! I love these! Thank you so
much for such a thoughtful birthday gift!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Is this a birthday present for me? You've
chosen well, it would seem! Thank you very
much.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this a birthday present? What a lovely gesture.
Thank you very much.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Did you choose this for me because you knew
today was my birthday? And you didn't mean
anything by it? ...Never mind. I'll take it. Thanks.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Why are you giving me something I hate for my
birthday? I'm going to assume you just didn't
know, but try a little harder next time, okay?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>I don't think of my birthday as anything
particularly special, but I still never expected to
receive this...<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>...
<PAGE>
You had so many things to choose from, and
yet this is what you picked? I feel like you did
this intentionally, just to get under my skin...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a perfect, magical birthday present, all
gold and sparkly... Thank you so very much!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is...quite beautiful. I'm thrilled to receive
something so rare and majestic on my birthday!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's the thought that counts, and this being rare
and...well, golden...shows that you really tried
your best to impress me.
<PAGE>
But I'm...really not a fan of these at all...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Why in the world did you choose this, of all
things? Yes, it's shiny, but that's all it is. Are you
trying to mock me or something?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you going to do with that rabbit? You
should probably release it, I'd think...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did you catch that? I really think you
should take it back to where you found it, and
release it into the wild...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ermines are small and delicate, so you should be
careful not to hold them too tightly.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, the sight of you holding a sifaka like
that...is just somehow very "you." And I mean
that in the best possible way!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a penguin, isn't it? Where in the world did
you catch it?!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't like monkeys because you can never tell
what they're thinking...and poker faces really
scare me. On animals, anyway!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I...really don't like parrots. So I'd appreciate it if
you'd...take that parrot away, please...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't like birds, so...I'd appreciate it if
you'd...take that thing away, please...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't really tell subtle differences between
animal species.
<PAGE>
If you release a hairless Angora rabbit into a
mountain environment, I definitely won't be able
to tell if it's of the regular or Angora variety.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please don't bring that small creature near me.
I'm scared of it for...some reason...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please don't bring that small creature with its
creepy comb anywhere near me. I'm scared of it
for...some reason...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like a pretty smart dog. Does it follow
orders, though?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How can anyone make a dog this fat? That
takes some talent. It's kind of impressive, in a
morbid sort of way...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dog seems pretty strong. I'm pretty sure if I
were to take it for a walk, I'd be the one getting
walked...and run...and dragged...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's quite the tummy this little fella's got. I
never knew dogs could get that fat.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a cute cat! I like cats. They don't fawn over
humans like dogs do.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Awww, I have to admit, that is one adorable cat.
But adorable or no, it's way too fat. I doubt it
can even move well with its current physique.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This cat has the most strokable hair! I just can't
keep my hands off of it...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
